sense.def:
Z izrazom
verbal
opisujemo stvari, ki so povezane z besedami in njihovo uporabo.

seg.quote: It was a contest in verbal skills.

sense.def:
Izraz
verbal
se nanaša na tisto, kar je izgovorjeno, ni pa zapisano.

seg.quote: ...a succession of verbal attacks on the chairman.
I will communicate your views verbally.

sense.def:
Izraz
verbal
opisuje tudi stvari, ki se nanašajo na glagole.

seg.quote: ...the structure of verbal groups in English.
